snippet.title: Die in the Dungeon - Official Prologue Announcement Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Get a fresh new look at Die in the Dungeon, including a breakdown of the redesigned visuals of the game, as well as the new enemies and more that you can expect in the free prologue of this roguelike deckbuilder. 


Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters. Die in the Dungeon will be available on PC.
